meanings.definition: A person who is paid based on the number of pieces they produce or complete.
meanings.sent1: The pieceworkers in the factory earn money for each item they finish.
meanings.sent2: The pieceworkers were happy to see their pay increase as they completed more pieces.
meanings.sent3: The pieceworkers joked that they should get paid in puzzle pieces instead of money.
meanings.sent4: The pieceworkers were like puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly into the production process.
meanings.sent5: The pieceworkers diligently worked to complete each piece, knowing their pay depended on it.

meanings.definition: Workers who are compensated for each individual task or item they complete.
meanings.sent1: Pieceworkers receive payment for every task they finish at the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The pieceworkers were motivated to complete more items to earn higher wages.
meanings.sent3: The pieceworkers playfully challenged each other to see who could finish the most tasks in a day.
meanings.sent4: The pieceworkers were like gears in a clock, each one essential for the whole system to work smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The pieceworkers diligently carried out each task, knowing their compensation depended on their productivity.
